file_content.text: "Using his brilliant eye for talent, Mayor Martik enlisted the aid of the Republic to keep Tatooine's jobs on Tatooine!" Let me get that down....
"Skillfully taming the fringe of the underworld, Mayor Martik enlisted the aid of a famous space captain to secure your jobs!" I'll jot that down....
I've already told the townsfolk that the mine is back in our hands.
I hope you've made sure that's true?
Those scum you hired tried to steal your ore and frame me for it!
No thanks to those mercs.
I'm... I... I don't know what to say. I'm really not used to dealing with such people....
I assure you I will tell every other town on Tatooine not to work with them.
And if I have any further problems, I'll go straight to the Republic.
And if I have any further problems, I'll be sure to look for help from, ah, good citizens like you.
Your mine is safe.
Oh, thank goodness! I don't know what I would have done if this had gone public.
I hope you're gonna pay me....
Of course. With the mine back in our hands, we should have no trouble making back anything we've lost.
The good citizens of Tatooine thank you for your service.
Ooh. That sounds nice. I should remember that one....
I'd appreciate if you hurry. I want that mine cleared out before anyone starts blaming me for it.
Well, you just figure out a way that this won't all fall back on me! This is an election year!
I'm sorry. Things have been a little tense, but nothing that should stop our friends in the Republic from enjoying their stay.
I'm sorry, Master Jedi. I didn't mean for you to see that.
I'm sorry, sir. I should have taken that call in my office.
Sorry. That wasn't exactly meant for public ears.
The Twin Suns pirates have been harassing us since the day I became mayor. And now they want to take our mine--ninety percent of this town works that mine!
I won't stand by while criminals drive your people from their jobs.
Can I help?
Everything they say about your order is true!
The Twin Suns shouldn't profit at the expense of people's dignity.
That's terrible.
Then you'll help us, Master Jedi? Thank you!
These criminals need to learn we're bringing law and order to Tatooine.
You need help?
Sir, if you can do that, we'll welcome the Republic, let me tell you.
Yeah? Does it bring in enough to be worth the Twin Suns' attention?
Is it valuable?
They're an intergalactic syndicate. This is pocket change for them. But it's our whole livelihood.
How are you dealing with it?
It happens.
Hey, it may not seem like much, but we've made something of this wasteland! And now those gangsters want to steal it.
I hired a group of mercenaries to drive off the Twin Suns, but they've had no luck so far. Stopped reporting back a few days ago.
If you can finish what those mercs couldn't, this town would be in your debt.
Who are these guys? Are they going to need rescuing?
Tell me about these mercs.
They failed to deliver, we don't owe them anything.
You have my word.
I'll let our citizens know you're on it!
I'll let our citizens know that the Jedi are personally involving themselves in our problems!
I'll let our citizens know the Republic has taken a personal interest in our problems.
I'll let our citizens know that the Twin Suns have met their match.
Just go to the mine and drive off the gangsters there. Put the scare on them, so they never come back.
And if there's any ore they haven't already sold off, I'd appreciate it if you could bring it back here for distribution.
Learn to fight. [Refuse quest]
I hadn't thought of it that way.... Oh, this is not going to be good for my poll numbers.
A higher standard of life on Tatooine! That's what my administration stands for....
